titleStmt.title: Scipio's dreame. Or The statesman's extasie Wherein is contayned an epitomie of all the sciences, naturall, morall, and supernaturall. Tending to proue the immortalitie of the soule, as the proper merit of iustice.
titleStmt.author: Cicero, Marcus Tullius.
E. C. S., fl. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. A[lsop] and T. Fawcet, for L. C[hapman] and are to be sold at his shop at Chancery Lane end,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and bookseller's name from STC.
Running title reads: The dreame of Scipio.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at Chancery Lane end
